verses.translation: By the sky containing great stars
And [by] the promised day
And [by] the witness and what is witnessed
Cursed were the companions of the pit
Of fire, [kept burning] with fuel
When they were sitting near it

verses.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa hum 'ala ma yaf'aluna bi-al-mu'minina shuhud
verses.translation: And they, to what they were doing to the believers, were witnesses

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma naqamu minhum illa an yu'minu billahi al-'azizi al-hamid
verses.translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

verses.arabic: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Alladhi lahu mulku as-samawati wa al-ardi wa allahu 'ala kulli shay'in shahid
verses.translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina fatanu al-mu'minina wa al-mu'minati thumma lam yatubu falahum 'adhabu jahannama wa lahum 'adhabu al-hariq
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina amanu wa 'amilu as-salihati lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu dhalika al-fawzu al-kabir
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment
Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe
Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats
And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate
Honorable Owner of the Throne
Effecter of what He intends
Has there reached you the story of the soldiers
Of Pharaoh and Thamud?
But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial
While Allah encompasses them from behind
But this is an honored Quran
[Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate
